revision.text:
Les contrastes polynomiaux sont un ensemble spécial de contrastes orthogonaux qui testent les modèles polynomiaux de données avec plus de deux moyennes (par exemple, linéaire, quadratique, cubique, quartique, etc.). Polynomial contrasts are a special set of orthogonal contrasts that test polynomial patterns in data with more than two means (e.g., linear, quadratic, cubic, quartic, etc.). a polynomial contrast is a contrast which... Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra Contraste polynomial orthogonal
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contrast_(statistics) is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/STATO_0000290
